quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs
chi: 熱愛你的工作，是做出偉大事業的唯一方式。

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon
chi: 人生就是當你忙着制定其他計劃時發生的事。

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay
chi: 預測未來的最好方法就是去創造它。

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats
chi: 不要等到鐵熱才揮擊，而應透過敲打把鐵燒熱。

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford
chi: 你認為你能或不能，你都對。

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau
chi: 成功通常降臨在那些忙於行動而無暇尋找成功的人身上。

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson
chi: 別盯著時鐘看；像時鐘一樣繼續運轉，持續前進。

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman
chi: 永遠面向陽光——陰影會落在你身後。

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky
chi: 你不出手的機會，錯過的百分之百。

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu
chi: 千里之行，始於足下。

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James
chi: 行動時要相信你的作為有意義，因為它確實如此。

quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn
chi: 要麼你掌控這一天，要麼這一天掌控你。

quote: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi
chi: 未來取決於你今天所做的事。

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after another.
author: Walter Elliot
chi: 毅力不是一場長跑，而是接連不斷的短跑。

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle
chi: 品質不是一個行為，而是一種習慣。

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain
chi: 要取得進展的秘訣就是開始行動。

quote: You have to be a little bit crazy to do great things.
author: Unknown
chi: 要成就偉大事業，你得有點瘋狂。

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
chi: 相信自己能，你就已完成了一半。

quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle
chi: 若機會不敲門，就自己造一扇門。

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller
chi: 不要害怕放棄好的，去追求更好的。

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn
chi: 我越努力，越幸運。

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius
chi: 不怕走得慢，只怕停下來。

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun
chi: 動機讓你開始，習慣讓你持續。

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
chi: 實現明天的唯一限制是我們今天的懷疑。

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney
chi: 如果你能夢想它，你就能做到它。

quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
author: Benjamin Franklin
chi: 要麼寫些值得閱讀的東西，要麼做些值得書寫的事。

quote: What we fear of doing most is usually what we most need to do.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
chi: 我們最害怕做的事通常是最需要去做的事。

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney
chi: 開始的方式是停止空談，開始行動。

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
chi: 沒有計劃的目標只不過是一個願望。

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar
chi: 開始時不必偉大，但要偉大就必須開始。

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
author: Alice Walker
chi: 人們放棄自己力量的最常見方式就是認為自己沒有力量。

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe
chi: 從你所在之處開始，用你擁有的，做你能做的。

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill
chi: 成功非終點，失敗非致命；重要的是繼續前進的勇氣。

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill
chi: 不要等待，時機永遠不會剛好。

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington
chi: 若想提升自己，就提升他人。

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra
chi: 最好的報復就是巨大的成功。

quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
author: Peter Marshall
chi: 小事做到勝過宏大計劃未做。

quote: Be not afraid of going slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
author: Chinese Proverb
chi: 不要畏懼緩慢前行，只怕停滯不前。

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair
chi: 你曾渴望的一切都在恐懼的另一側。

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis
chi: 艱難常使平凡人成就非凡的命運。

quote: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs
chi: 你的時間有限，別浪費在活別人的人生上。

quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn
chi: 別希望事情更簡單，應該希望自己更強大。

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
chi: 你註定要成為的人，是你自己決定成為的人。

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs
chi: 熱愛你的工作，是做出偉大事業的唯一方式。

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon
chi: 人生就是當你忙着制定其他計劃時發生的事。

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay
chi: 預測未來的最好方法就是去創造它。

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats
chi: 不要等到鐵熱才揮擊，而應透過敲打把鐵燒熱。

author: Henry Ford
chi: 你認為你能或不能，你都對。

author: Henry David Thoreau

author: William James

author: Jim Rohn
chi: 要麼你掌控這一天，要麼這一天掌控你。

author: Confucius
